name: MMA: Minimalist Mayhem Arena
description:
MMA: minimalist mayhem arena

You're bleeding out and it looks like those enemies have the blood you need to survive. Kill as many enemies as you can in this movement-based horde survival game.

Controls:

W - move up

A - move left

S - move down

D - move right

1 - swap to spear

2 - swap to bomb

3 - swap to shield

Weapons:

Left Click - performs primary attack:

-spear - thrust your spear forward after a slight charge

-bomb - throw, distance based on long left click is held

-shield - attempt to parry

Right Click - alt attack:

-spear - lunge forward

-bomb - no effect

-shield - ignites nearby bombs and blocks damage in direction held

Swap Effects:

-spear - redirect knockback effects to the direction of cursor. The spears hitbox becomes active with damage scaling based on relative speed

-bomb - no effect

-shield - knocks back nearby enemies

Entry for Mini Jam 110 Sacrifice
